translations.translation: Are you astonished at this news,
Will you, then, wonder at this?
Does this statement seem strange to them
So are you surprised at this fact?
Do you then wonder at this reci- tation
Do you then wonder at this announcement?
Do you then marvel at this discourse,
Marvel ye then at this statement,
Do you then find these tidings strange?
At this discourse then marvel ye?
Will you then wonder at this discourse,
Do ye then wonder at this recital?
Do you then wonder at this recital (the Quran)?
Do you marvel then at this discourse (the Koran)?
Do you marvel at this discourse?
Then at this statement do you wonder?
[53:59] Do you then marvel, in denial, at this discourse, the Qur’ān,
(Marvel ye then at this statement) He says: are you mocking-and it is said: are you denying-this Qur'an which Muhammad (pbuh) recites to you, people of Mecca,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ثم وبخ سبحانه على المنكرين ليوم القيامة المستكبرين عن قبولها فقال: { أَفَمِنْ هَـٰذَا ٱلْحَدِيثِ } الصحيح، والحق الصريح الذي هو القرآن المعجز { تَعْجَبُونَ } [النجم: 59] تعنتاً وإنكاراً
